channel.title: The Culinary Institute of America Insight From the Inside
channel.description: Students at The Culinary Institute of America talk about life at the CIA.

image.title: The Culinary Institute of America Insight From the Inside

item.title: Athletics at the CIA
item.description: We sit down with Mike Murphy, fitness coordinator at the CIA, to discuss athletics at the Culinary Institute of America.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: A Look at Campus Activities
item.description: Life at the CIA is extends well beyond the classroom, David Whalen the associate dean for student activities shares some insights into the various activities students can participate in at the CIA.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside: Focus on Food Jobs
item.description: Irena Chalmers & Ron Hayes join us in this special episode to take a look at the various jobs available to those with a culinary degree in the food service industry.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with CIA President & Alumnus Tim Ryan
item.description: The world of culinary education is evolving, and we get an exclusive insight with our own President & Alumnus Tim Ryan.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Nate Appleman
item.description: One of Food & Wine Magzine's Ten Best New Chefs joins us for Insight from the Inside.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Michael Ruhlman
item.description: We sit down with Michael Ruhlman to discuss his unique journey as a CIA student, as well as his latest book Ratio.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Anne Burrell
item.description: From the Food Network we welcome CIA Alumnus Anne Burrell to share her love of cooking and food.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Scott Conant
item.description: Join us as we sit down with Scott Conant, CIA Alumnus, and owner of Scarpetta Restaurant in New York and Miami.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Grant Achatz
item.description: This time on Insight from the Inside we spend some time with AOS graduate, and Chicago restaurateur Grant Achatz.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Charlie Palmer
item.description: Insight from the Inside sits down with CIA Alumnus, Charlie Palmer, who graduated from the AOS degree program. Charlie now an owner of several prestigious restaurants, and spends a few minutes with us to share his thoughts on the modern kitchen, technology and innovation.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with John Besh
item.description: Insight from the Inside sits down with New Orleans native John Besh and learns about his background, the impact Hurricane Katrina had on his cooking, and his culinary adventures.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Johnny Iuzzini
item.description: Insight Spends A Few Minutes Talking About the Sweeter Side of Things With Johnny Iuzzini
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Steve Ells
item.description: Insight from the Inside has a unique opportunity to spend a few minutes with the founder of Chipotle Mexican Grill, and CIA Alumnus Steve Ells.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Sara Moulton
item.description: Sara Moulton shares her insights from 30 years spent in the Culinary World, including her experiences with Good Moring America, and she tells us about her new show Saras Weeknight Meals.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Dan Coudreaut
item.description: Insight from the Inside sits down with Dan Coudreaut, McDonalds director of culinary innovation to find out how things work behind the scenes in the worlds largest kitchen.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Top Chef Winners Ilan Hall and Hung Huynh
item.description: Insight from the Inside gets up close with winners of Bravo's Top Chef season two and three.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Michael Symon
item.description: Insight from the Inside gets up close with the winner of The Next Iron Chef, Michael Symon.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Duff Goldman
item.description: Insight from the Inside hits the road and visits the Ace of Cakes in Baltimore, Maryland.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: CIA Insight from the Inside with Cat Cora
item.description: Celebrity Chef, and CIA alumnus, Cat Cora shares her experiences both at the CIA, and since as she has traveled the world.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: Campus Life at the CIA
item.description: Find out what student life is like at the Culinary Instute of America.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com

item.title: Life at the Culinary Institute of America
item.description: Get insight from some of the CIA's students and learn what life is like for students at the world's premier culinary college.
item.author: mail@citycastmedia.com
